testsuite.name: tests.shopping.TestProductShopping
testsuite.system-out: STEP - Launch Browser Successfully... STEP - Navigate to Casa39 English Website Home Page. STEP - Accepting Cookies... STEP - Choose and Select Category As FLOOR TILES From Product Categories Selecting FLOOR TILES from list... Click - Cleansers Verified - Cleansers - Sub Category Opened Successfully... STEP - Validate Sorting Options Select Sorting Option As - bestsellers Click - BestSellers Highlights MostViewed New Price Select Sorting Option As - is_hot Click - BestSellers Highlights MostViewed New Price Select Sorting Option As - most_viewed Click - BestSellers Highlights MostViewed New Price Select Sorting Option As - new Click - BestSellers Highlights MostViewed New Price Select Sorting Option As - price Click - BestSellers Highlights MostViewed New Price STEP - Apply all filters one by one. Click - Click - Click - Click - Click - Click - STEP - Set price range. STEP - Change Products Per Page Select Products Per Page As - 48 Select Products Per Page As - 72 Select Products Per Page As - 24 STEP - Clicking CASA39 Logo to Return On Home Page... Click - STEP - Closing Browser Successfully...
